citations.desc: ATTENDING VETERINARIAN AND ADEQUATE VETERINARY CARE (DEALERS AND EXHIBITORS).
citations.narrative:
A written Program of Veterinary Care was not available for review. The Attending Veterinarian is making regularly
scheduled visits to the facility, and documentation was available to verify this, however a written Program of
Veterinary Care could not be located during the inspection. A written Program of Veterinary Care including methods
for parasite control, emergency care and other veterinary approved procedures must be documented and
maintained by the facility.
**********Correct by April 21, 2016
An exit briefing was conducted with the licensee.

narrative:
2.40(a)(1)
ATTENDING VETERINARIAN AND ADEQUATE VETERINARY CARE (DEALERS AND EXHIBITORS).
A written Program of Veterinary Care was not available for review.  The Attending Veterinarian is making regularly
scheduled visits to the facility, and documentation was available to verify this, however a written Program of
Veterinary Care could not be located during the inspection.  A written Program of Veterinary Care including methods
for parasite control, emergency care and other veterinary approved procedures must be documented and
maintained by the facility.  
**********Correct by April 21, 2016
An exit briefing was conducted with the licensee.
